LanguageData.AM_PyramidBurialOutcome.description: Залежно від якості ритуалу, учасники отримають від {MINMOOD} до {MAXMOOD} настрій на {MOODDAYS} днів.
LanguageData.AM_PyramidBurialOutcome.outcomeChances.0: {0} пройшло жахливо The speech was boring and the entombing was very sloppy. This horrible experience will forever affect our opinion of this pyramid.
LanguageData.AM_PyramidBurialOutcome.outcomeChances.1: {0} пройшло нудно The speech was long-winded and did not honour them.
LanguageData.AM_PyramidBurialOutcome.outcomeChances.2: {0} пройшло Добре The speaker's final words provided a path for everyone to move on.
LanguageData.AM_PyramidBurialOutcome.outcomeChances.3: {0} пройшло неймовірно The speech was captivating and heartfelt, and everyone came away focused on good memories. This pyramid will forever be part of our people's history.
LanguageData.AM_PyramidBurialOutcome.comps.0.label: присутній моральний наставник
LanguageData.AM_PyramidBurialOutcome.comps.1.label: кількість учасників
